## WCH\_PROVIDER\_BROWSER\_WINDOW variable

Provides the `WCH_CONTEXT_WINDOW` token for browser based applications.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
WCH_PROVIDER_BROWSER_WINDOW: import("@acoustic-content-sdk/react-api").ReactProvider<WindowType>
```
